description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a garbageman? Wonder no more and step into the exciting world of garbage collection.  Dodge obstacles and collect garbage in 4 unique garbage trucks!
